mapper.select: SELECT s.StoryID, s.EpicID, s.ShortName, s.Description, s.StartDate, s.EndDate, s.ActualStartDate, s.ActualEndDate, s.Status FROM Story s WHERE 1 = 1 AND s.EpicID = #{epicID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Story( EpicID, ShortName, Description, StartDate, EndDate, ActualStartDate, ActualEndDate, Status )VALUES ( #{epic.epicID}, #{shortName}, #{description}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{actualStartDate}, #{actualEndDate}, #{status} )
